title: Evolution Festival 2010
content:
Since its inception in 2003 Newcastle’s Evolution Festival has gone through huge changes, beginning as a free festival it has mutated into an event that’s now respected worldwide. Although the line-up may not compete with the likes of Reading/leads or Bestival, this year’s set of artists more than warrants the price of admission. Highlights include the north east’s very own The Futureheads as well as The Horrors. Spanning two sites the festival undoubtedly offers something for even the most hardened music snob; us included. In the coming days Crack in the Road will be offering its top tips for the festival as this bank holiday weekend draws ever closer. Below is the festival’s full line-up to get you all excited, as well as a link to the festival’s lesser known event ‘Evolution Emerging’. We’ll see you there!

Paolo Nutini
